title: NBA Finals: Who has the edge Curry vs Smart?
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss who has the advantage between the Warriors experience and the Celtics physical defense. Jalen breaks down the matchup between Steph Curry and DPOY Marcus Smart. Las Vegas has high confidence in the Nets 2023 title hopes - is that a good bet? PLUS, Aaron Donald says he's "fine" without football. Should the Rams be worried about an early retirement? AND Cultural or Regional: picking up a wild armadillo with your bare hands.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
